member.name: T:Design2WorkroomApi.Models.AppUserAppUser
member.summary: Bridge table used for many-to-many self-referencing relationship with AppUsers. Used for many-to-many relationship between Designers-Clients and Designers-Workrooms. Designer, Client, and Workroom models use the table-per-hierarchy pattern hence the need for a self-referencing relationship. ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/ef/core/modeling/inheritance
